name: Mistral AI Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Mistral AI Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Mistral AI API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Mistral AI API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: document

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: extractText
available_options: Extract Text (值: extractText) - Extract text from document using OCR

model.name: model
model.natural_language_description: 参数名: Model | 作用: The OCR model to use | 默认值: mistral-ocr-latest | (必填项)

documentType.name: documentType
documentType.description: The type of document to process
documentType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Document Type | 作用: The type of document to process | 默认值: document_url | (必填项)

inputType.name: inputType
inputType.description: How the document will be provided
inputType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Type | 作用: How the document will be provided | 默认值: binary | (必填项)

binaryProperty.name: binaryProperty
binaryProperty.description: Name of the input binary field that contains the file to process
binaryProperty.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Binary Field | 作用: Name of the input binary field that contains the file to process | 提示: Uploaded document files must not exceed 50 MB in size and should be no longer than 1,000 pages. | 默认值: data | (必填项)

url.name: url
url.description: URL of the document or image to process
url.natural_language_description: 参数名: URL | 作用: URL of the document or image to process | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: batch (值: None) - Whether to process multiple documents in a single API call (more cost-efficient)
batchSize (值: None) - Maximum number of documents to process in a single batch
deleteFiles (值: None) - Whether to delete the files on Mistral Cloud after processing
